[vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”40584″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text el_class=”page-title-overlap”]

LIBRARIES

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern” z_index=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1575835851507{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580397428796{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section”]

Students also have access to the central libraries of the Egaleo Park, Ancient Olive Grove and Athens campuses. All the libraries dispose of specialized staff and the appropriate facilities to support students in their study and research. The library website lists offered services and provides access to digital directories, online resources, online journals, and other scientific material.

 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css_animation=”” row_type=”row” use_row_as_full_screen_section=”no” type=”full_width” angled_section=”no” text_align=”left” background_image_as_pattern=”without_pattern”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1578249736992{padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”40587″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580397479714{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section”]

LIBRARY IN EGALEO PARK CAMPUS

Agiou Spyridonos, 122 43, Egaleo

 

Contact:
Head of Library: 210 53 85 134
Loan Service Office: 210 53 85 711
Fax: +30 210 5385 893
E-mail: library1@unipa.gr
URL: http://library1.UNIWA.gr/

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1578249741482{padding-right: 0px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”40590″ img_size=”full” qode_css_animation=””][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1580397547449{background-color: #ffffff !important;}” el_class=”content-section”]

250 Thivon & P. Ralli, 12244, Egaleo

 

Contact:

Fax: +30 210 56 90 158
E-mail: library2@unipa.gr
URL: http://library2.UNIWA.gr/
